channel.title: PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360
channel.description: Alright, So I plan on buying one of these but I have mixed feelings. Hopefully you guys can help me chose!

item.title: PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:19, topic:390146”]I’ve had a PS3, Xbox 360, PS2, PS1, and quite honestly, the Xbox 360 is my favorite. On games like COD, xbox live users get the new map packs, updates, etc days before the ps3. I think we can almost all agree that the xbox’s control is much, much better than the playstations. However, I always loved the Jak & Daxter & Ratchet & Clank games on the playstation. Except they don’t make Jak & Daxter anymore, and Ratchet & Clank has really started to suck :\ The main reason I sold my PS3 was because my xbox red ringed and I needed money to get a new one, and all my friends had xbox.[/quote] They get stuff for COD b4 us because they have a 3 year contract with Activision that they get everything b4 PS3 and PC. 1 year has passed.

Read full topic

@someone2 wrote:

item.title: PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:26, topic:390146”][quote author=Squirt Ltd link=topic=486058.msg3562756#msg3562756 date=1302399816]
psp is where is at
real gamers use a psp
[/quote]
Got a hacked one? Got a 2000 like 3 years ago, and ive had 5.50Prome4 on it since it came out, best investment ever made lol.

@TOPIC - Generally, it depends on what you are looking for in a gaming system, you will need to know the main parts, do you want a system where less cheats are? Would you want a system for the ABILITY to have better graphics (only exclusive PS3 games can have better graphics than xbox, and most multi-platform games on PS3 wont get as good of FPS as 360). As well as what controller feels better in your hands? (Larger hands do better with Xbox remote than PS3)[/quote]
i broke it in like 2 weeks cus im cool like dat

Read full topic

item.title: PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Squirt Ltd, post:18, topic:390146”]psp is where is at
real gamers use a psp [/quote]
Got a hacked one? Got a 2000 like 3 years ago, and ive had 5.50Prome4 on it since it came out, best investment ever made lol.

@TOPIC - Generally, it depends on what you are looking for in a gaming system, you will need to know the main parts, do you want a system where less cheats are? Would you want a system for the ABILITY to have better graphics (only exclusive PS3 games can have better graphics than xbox, and most multi-platform games on PS3 wont get as good of FPS as 360). As well as what controller feels better in your hands? (Larger hands do better with Xbox remote than PS3)

Read full topic

item.title: PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360

I only have a PS3, but I have used an Xbox before and I did like it. But for now PC is much better then both.
[/quote]maybe if your able to keep up with it’s constant changes.

the original version of the xbox 360 can play new games.

pc gaming is a waste of money.

pc rapes both with better graphics and no annoying lags and replace able hardware

and its not a waste of money, my 4 year old pc was able to keep up with the new games[/quote]it’s still wayyyy more expensive.

item.title: PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

I’ve had a PS3, Xbox 360, PS2, PS1, and quite honestly, the Xbox 360 is my favorite. On games like COD, xbox live users get the new map packs, updates, etc days before the ps3. I think we can almost all agree that the xbox’s control is much, much better than the playstations. However, I always loved the Jak & Daxter & Ratchet & Clank games on the playstation. Except they don’t make Jak & Daxter anymore, and Ratchet & Clank has really started to suck :\ The main reason I sold my PS3 was because my xbox red ringed and I needed money to get a new one, and all my friends had xbox.

Read full topic

item.title: PlayStation 3 or Xbox 360
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I’d get a 360, simply due to the fact that the majority of the people on this site have one if you ever wanted to play with them, and if you’re like me, your friends all have XBox. Also from what I’ve heard, if you’ve ever wanted to play MW2 on PS3 then you might as well just 10th prestige lobby the first day.

Read full topic
